SEARCH
Package com.masri.TaskMangamentSystem.service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.masri.TaskMangamentSystem.service.UserService
@Service public class UserService extends Object
Service class that manages users in the Task Management System. Provides functionality for adding, retrieving, updating, and deleting users.
Author:
ahmad almasri

  • Constructor Details

    • UserService

      @Autowired public UserService(UserDao userDao)
      Constructs a UserService with the specified UserDao.
      Parameters:
      userDao - the DAO used to interact with user data

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      public void addUser(User user) throws DuplicateUserExecption
      Adds a new user if the email is not already in use.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to be added
      Throws:
      DuplicateUserExecption - if the email is already used by another user

    • getUserById

      public User getUserById(int id) throws UserNotFoundException
      Retrieves a user by their unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the user
      Returns:
      the user with the specified ID
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if no user is found with the given ID

    • updateUser

      public void updateUser(User user) throws UserNotFoundException, DuplicateUserExecption
      Updates an existing user's information.
      Parameters:
      user - the user with updated information
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user to be updated does not exist
      DuplicateUserExecption - if the updated email is already used by another user

    • deleteUserById

      public void deleteUserById(int id) throws UserNotFoundException
      Deletes a user by their unique identifier. Also removes the user from all projects they are associated with.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the user to be deleted
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if no user is found with the given ID
